comments.html:
Hi,

My Environment:

M3 Macbook Air with Sonomo (14.7.6). Installed Multipass, Created an netlab Ubuntu instance and Created a sample 2 node lab etc...and I have seen this blog post and thought of trying it...

So I added those two lines and started a lab. The output says it is success and printed the URL and when I tried to access it, I was not able to... started troubleshooting... The docker image of "netreplica/graphite" is showing... But when I try to run that docker image for testing, it gave me the following output "WARNING: The requested image's platform (linux/amd64) does not match the detected host platform (linux/arm64/v8) and no specific platform was requested"

So is there any way to make this graphite works for the arm64 architecture... Sorry... I don't know any programming etc and I am trying to learn this netlab. So if any naive or stupid questions if I have asked, please forgive and guide me or just give me a clue and I will try to go along that way

TIA

PAM
comments.name: paamaran
